amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 115-830 to designate $300,000 within the Operation of the National Park System for the New England Scenic Trail.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Courtney.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
